name: trello-clone
description: A Trello Clone using HTMX and Cloudflare Workers

scripts.build: npm run format && npm run test && rm -rf ./build && npx tsc && npx esbuild --bundle assets/styles.css --outfile=assets/styles.min.css --minify && npx tsx tools/compile.ts && npx esbuild ./src/worker.ts --bundle --outdir=build --format=esm --minify

author: Jeremiah Langner
